name: aws-console-link-sharer
description: Chrome extension for sharing AWS Console links with URL cleaning and deep link generation

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/icons dist/ && cp src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && cp src/popup/popup.css dist/popup/ && cp src/options/options.html dist/options/ && cp src/options/options.css dist/options/
